ratings.comment: Professor Halzen is amazing! She is really passionate about the phonetics behind the French language and really helped boost my confidence in speaking French! The class generally has a smaller size, so she is able to pay more attention to her students! If you spend time on practicing the oral homework/exercises and improve overall, you'll do great!

Gosh, she is just one of my favorite professors! She's very attentive and has your best in mind, but DON'T skip class after class. She loves to make jokes and play in a way that make 50 minute class periods enjoyable and even fun.

I have never done so much work for french in my life and this was NOT my first french class at Madison. She really makes you work for your grade which sucks when you have 12 other science credits to deal with.

Best French professor yet. Advanced class was very intimidating at first but she is so helpful. She is very nice & wants you to improve your French. Her French is clear and she explains things well. She grades partly based on your individual improvement. I felt this class really improved my French but you definitely have to put work in to succeed.

She is a little intimidating at first but she's so great. The typical european teacher. She likes her students and makes little jokes. And you can tell she is genuinely interested in what she teaches. Her accent is impeccable and she is very helpful. Loved taking this class and loved her! Be sure to participate and read!!
I loved her!! She prepared so much for our class that it made me want to.. and what we read was really really interesting.  I definitely reccomend her for everyone!
She's a great professor. She loves what she does!!

MAGNIFIQUE!  Prof. Halzen is so enthusiastic about the class material, and although at times she can seem a bit intense, she's overall a great instructor.  The literature in FR271 is so fun, interesting and makes the class all the better.  Participate, even if she continually interrupts you.

PARTICIPATE!!! The more you participate, the better your grade. Make sure to read the book thoroughly- she tests exceptions to phonetic rules. Madame wants you to do well, and she grades heavily on improvement. This class REALLY improves your spoken french!

Madame is very engaged in what she teaches, and truly loves french literature. She's intelligent and extremely fair; it is simple to do well in the class, as long as you make an effort to be prepared for class. Can not recommend her enough! :)
She is a great teacher who keeps you engaged in the material.  Be prepared, participate, and you will do fine.  No tests are GREAT!
Dr Halzen is a great teacher. She is always well prepared. Interesting course. I learned a lot.

She is very intense.  You must be prepared for class, and I recommend you think of comments to add before the class starts - participation is VERY important.  She is fair and challenging, but not MEAN.  She also brings us chocolate...
Madame likes to teach. If you like to learn, you'll like her.
Madame is very intense, but it is because she wants us to reach our full protential.  She is very helpful and encouraging! You learn a lot in her class.

she is very intense, i agree, and definitely doesn't think like an american.  ie, she's kind of insulting, in a "just for fun" kind of way.  she also is very politically slanted, and it really doesn't belong in french class.
